comments:
Build ID: Build id: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:

Config:
WTP2.0.1 with Generic server and WLS tools 1.1 plugin, JDK1.6.0
Repro:
1. Start wls tool with an empty workspace,
2. Add JBoss or wls9.0 runtime by Window>Preferences>Server>Installed runtimes, 
3. Create a HelloWeb targeting to the wls9.0 runtime,
4. Add a Hello.jsp,
5. Right-click Hello.jsp, run on server,
7. Inspect the .log


More information:

Tried WTP2.0 release, the NPE was also thrown but at least not logged in Error Log.
So it sounds like this bug was present by went unnoticed in 2.0 and maybe earlier due to the way exceptions were handled.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 206810 ***
